p: In the year 2002 and 2003 SARS-CoV became endemic in South China in Guangdong region [ 11]. Similarly, MERS-CoV, 2012 outbreak in middle east from bat [ 5] and dromedary camel [ 17]. With the evolution of time the mechanism of recombination in animals periodically bring about periodic cross-species infection. CoV is RNA based virus where recombination is more invited. In 2019, this recombination generated 2019-CoV infection which has also transmitted from bat having 86.9% nucleotide sequence identity with SARS-like CoV [ 33] and very close to novel beta coronavirus of Coronaviridae family [ 25]. China was already suspected of such outbreak as Fan and their research group has shown the concern through his article in March 2019 [ 8]. Looking at the current concern this article aims to spread the general awareness and terminology associated with 2019- CoV.
